entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Beaver Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaver Island 04:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: E 46 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or snow ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023
